Brief: "What The Future" (WTFuture) is an Android horoscope app that offers a blend of astrology and humor, designed for those who appreciate a direct and comically irreverent approach to their daily predictions. Developed by Night Cat Productions â€“ the creators behind WTForecast and Pregnant AF â€“ this app promises to deliver zodiac insights in a unique and humorous way, complete with customizable profanity settings to tailor the experience to your liking.
